lyrics:

whats this your kiss

theres a secret in your soul
well did you think that i

well i may be blind

chorus
i feel it comin

verse 2
a cold spell in hell
thats when i take you back
if you have been untrue
theres nothing left to do but pack your bags

and youll wake up cryin
callin out my name my name
see sara evans liveget tickets as low as 99you might also likechorus

bridge
comin on like the morning sun
like a summer rain
like the river runs
like the ocean waves
like the stormy sea
like the flood of tears
wash over me
